TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDestinationTypeProvider

summary.span: 表示服務，這個服務可以傳回目的型別的 CLR 型別系統識別項。

span.span: Represents a service that can return a CLR type system identifier for the destination type.

summary.span: 當屬性設定作業的目的型別是透過反映或其他機制間接報告時，目的型別就顯得很重要。

span.span: The destination type is relevant when the destination type for a property-setting operation is indirectly reported by reflection or other mechanisms.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的型別使用目前的 XAML 結構描述內容解析從 XAML 節點資料流目前位置。The type that is returned by is resolved from the current position of the XAML node stream by using current XAML schema context. 如果您使用 XAML 類型系統，由.NET Framework XAML 服務及存取服務內容，根據這些條件，實作傳回根據可用的 XAML 類型系統資訊和 CLR 為基礎的 XAML 結構描述內容。If you use the XAML type system as implemented by .NET Framework XAML Services and access the service context under these conditions, returns the based on available XAML type system information and CLR-based XAML schema context. 此服務是與相關的情況下，其中純 CLR 反映或其他機制可能會提供足夠的相關資訊的目的型別。This service is relevant for situations where pure CLR reflection or other mechanisms might not provide enough information about a destination type. 以下是一些相關案例的清單:The following is a list of some relevant scenarios for : - CLR 型別系統報告間接的型別，因為 CLR 如何定義及使用類型，而且您想，則為 true 的目的型別。The CLR type system reports an indirect type because of how the CLR defines and uses types, and you want a true destination type. 例如，.NET Framework XAML 服務中的 Api 這項服務在內部使用時它們會處理事件成員。For example, the APIs in .NET Framework XAML Services use this service internally when they process event members. 事件會報告為單純的 CLR 反映。Events are reported by pure CLR reflection as a . - 您想要確保使用類型轉換器的目的型別符合預期的類型，可能會產生型別轉換子。You want to ensure that the destination type of a type converter usage matches the expected type that the type converter can produce. 此案例會很有用的目的型別參數化或一般。This scenario is useful when the destination type is parameterized or generic. - 值轉換器被呼叫從巢狀方式置於另一個的值轉換器的使用方式。Your value converter is being called from a usage that nested in another value converter. 在此情況下，回溯巢狀，並傳回所設定，而不會傳回任何中介的值轉換器的輸出型別之實際屬性的目的型別。In this case, unwinds the nesting and returns the destination type of the actual property being set, instead of returning the output type of any intervening value converter. 類型轉換器和標記延伸可以查詢為 XAML 物件寫入器叫用的值轉換行為時，會將 XAML 物件寫入器中，所提供的服務內容上的服務。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)並[Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md).

related.span: XAML 類型轉換器或標記延伸

span.span: Type Converters or Markup Extensions for XAML

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetDestinationType() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回 CLR ，這個項目識別相關型別轉換器或標記延伸的目的型別。

span.span: Returns the CLR that identifies the destination type for the relevant type converter or markup extension.

returns.span: 目的型別的 CLR 值。

span.span: A CLR value for the destination type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法沒有任何輸入的參數。This method has no input parameter. 要傳回的項目 (以及是否要傳回任何項目以外的其他`null`) 取決於目前的節點位置，在 XAML 節點資料流。What to return (and whether to return anything other than `null`) is determined by the current node position in the XAML node stream. ## 服務實作器Service Implementers 如果您實作這項服務，方法應傳回的標記延伸或類型轉換器預期要檢查其最明確的轉換或輸出類型的型別。If you reimplement this service, the method should return the type that a markup extension or type converter expects to check against its most specific conversion or output type.
